section.title: Member Variable Names
section.para: Member variable and member function identifiers are all lower case letters. An underscore is used for word separation.
Member variables are prefixed by m_, so for instance name would become m_name.
Static member variables are prefixed by sm_.
This helps identify what the type of an variable is and it is less ugly than just prefixing with _.

section.title: Namespace Names
section.para: namespace identifiers should be as short as possible and lower case.
